verses.roman:
vāṇīnātha vasu ādi yata grāmī jana
sabei caitanya-bhṛtya,--caitanya-prāṇadhana

synonyms: vāṇīnātha vasu—of the name Vāṇīnātha Vasu; ādi—heading the list; yata—all; grāmī—of the village; jana—inhabitants; sabei—all of them; caitanya-bhṛtya—servants of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caitanya-prāṇa-dhana—their life and soul was Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: All the inhabitants of Kulīna-grāma village, headed by Vāṇīnātha Vasu, were servants of Lord Caitanya, who was their only life and wealth.
